statements: SELECT * FROM game_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon' ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE 'Sword%';
SELECT asset_id, asset_type, asset_name FROM game_assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon' ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_data FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type IN ('armor', 'shield') ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_type, asset_data FROM game_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE '%sword%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT asset_type, COUNT(*) AS asset_count FROM game_assets GROUP BY asset_type HAVING asset_count > 10;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets;
SELECT * FROM level_data;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_data FROM game_assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT level_name, level_difficulty, level_map FROM level_data WHERE level_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon';
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE '%sword%';
SELECT level_name, level_difficulty FROM level_data WHERE level_difficulty > 5 ORDER BY level_difficulty DESC;
SELECT asset_name, LENGTH(asset_data) AS data_length FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'armor';
SELECT * FROM level_data WHERE level_map->>'size' = 'large' ORDER BY level_difficulty ASC, level_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'character';
SELECT * FROM audio_assets ORDER BY audio_duration DESC;
SELECT level_name, level_difficulty FROM level_data WHERE level_difficulty IN ('Easy', 'Medium');
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon';
SELECT audio_name, audio_duration FROM audio_assets WHERE audio_duration > 60;
SELECT level_name, level_difficulty, level_map FROM level_data WHERE level_difficulty = 'hard';
SELECT * FROM game_assets JOIN audio_assets ON game_assets.asset_id = audio_assets.audio_id;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, audio_name, audio_duration FROM game_assets, audio_assets WHERE game_assets.asset_id = audio_assets.audio_id;
SELECT * FROM LevelData;
SELECT level_id, level_name FROM LevelData ORDER BY level_name DESC;
SELECT image_url FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM AudioFiles WHERE audio_id = 3;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM Assets WHERE asset_size > 100;
SELECT * FROM Assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM Assets WHERE asset_type = 'Image';
SELECT asset_name, asset_size FROM Assets ORDER BY asset_size DESC;
SELECT Assets.asset_name, Images.image_url, AudioFiles.audio_url FROM Assets INNER JOIN Images ON Assets.asset_id = Images.asset_id INNER JOIN AudioFiles ON Assets.asset_id = AudioFiles.asset_id;

SELECT Assets.asset_name, LevelData.level_name, LevelData.level_difficulty FROM Assets INNER JOIN Images ON Assets.asset_id = Images.asset_id INNER JOIN LevelData ON Images.image_id = LevelData.image_id;
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets ORDER BY asset_type DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_size FROM assets WHERE asset_size > 100;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT level_id, level_name, level_difficulty FROM levels ORDER BY level_difficulty ASC;
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE asset_size > 100;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT level_name, level_difficulty FROM levels ORDER BY level_difficulty DESC;
SELECT player_id, asset_name, acquisition_date FROM player_assets INNER JOIN assets ON player_assets.asset_id = assets.asset_id;
